title: Flowerperson
body:
<<if !visited("Flowerperson.TakeFlower")>>
    ...
    Oh... hi... it's you.
    Sorry, I just can't really concentrate lately.
    -> What's wrong?
        Oh nothing, it's just that there has been this legend of a flower that only in blooms every 1.000 years.
        I need to have it.
        You can't miss it with it's shiny golden petals and golden stem to match.
        Would you do me the favour of bringing me one specimen?
        You will be able to find the flower in the north-east of the island.
        That's all what's on my mind lately and It'd really help to to have it.
    -> I have your flower. <<if $goldFlower>>
        [[Flowerperson.TakeFlower]]
<<endif>>
Thanks for getting that flower earlier, it's absolutely hypnotising.
I'm trying to make other flowers look exactly the same now.

title: Flowerperson.TakeFlower
body:
You do!
This is great!!
Just look how it shines!!!
